Package variaveis

Class VariableManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • variaveis.VariableManager
  • public class VariableManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing all the variables the administrator has created. Has methods to add, edit and remove variables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      VariableManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getDBVariables

        public void getDBVariables()
        Extracts all records from the variables table from the database.

      • getVariables

        public java.util.ArrayList<Variable> getVariables()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the variables in the database.

      • insertVariable

        public void insertVariable​(Variable variable)
        Insert a new variable into the database. If the variable does not have an ID it will be assigned one automatically by the database auto-increment.
        Parameters:
        variable - the variable to be inserted.

      • editVariable

        public void editVariable​(Variable oldVariable,
                         Variable newVariable)
        Attempts to update the value of a variable in the database by invoking the stored procedure updateVariable through the current variable object and another variable object instantiated with the value parameter to be modified, supplied as argument.
        Parameters:
        oldVariable - the old variable object corresponding to the variable and its current information.
        newVariable - the new variable object corresponding to the same variable instantiated only with of new value to changed.

      • deleteVariable

        public void deleteVariable​(Variable variable)
        Tries to delete a variable by calling the stored procedure apagarVariaveis with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        variable - is the object variavel that we want to delete.

      • callStoredProcedure2Doubles

        public void callStoredProcedure2Doubles​(java.lang.String sp,
                                        double arg1,
                                        double arg2,
                                        java.lang.String message)
        Calls a stored procedure through its name that is entered as an argument. Method to help update the limits of temperature and luminosity of the greenhouse.
        Parameters:
        sp - the name of the stored procedure to be called (alterarLimitesTemperatura and alterarLimitesLuz).
        arg1 - the field to enter the lower or higher value of the luminosity or temperature limits.
        arg2 - the field to enter the lower or higher value of the luminosity or temperature limits.
        message - the field corresponding to a message that tells what has changed, whether the luminosity or temperature limits.

      • alterarLimitesTemperatura

        public void alterarLimitesTemperatura​(double limiteInferior,
                                      double limiteSuperior)
        Method that changes the values â€‹â€‹of the upper and lower limits of the greenhouse temperature.
        Parameters:
        limiteInferior - the value of lower limit.
        limiteSuperior - the value of upper limit.

      • alterarLimitesLuz

        public void alterarLimitesLuz​(double limiteInferior,
                              double limiteSuperior)
        Method that changes the values â€‹â€‹of the upper and lower limits of the greenhouse luminosity.
        Parameters:
        limiteInferior - the value of lower limit.
        limiteSuperior - the value of upper limit.
